attributes.action: Give a TAX FREE lump sum of £5000, to ALL FANTASTIC HEALTH WORKERS.
attributes.additional_details:
The National Health workers are going over and above in their efforts to keep us all well. They must feel that they are appreciated. 
When this virus is beaten wouldn't it be fantastic for the Government to give each and everyone of them a big Thank You! Bonus of £5000 each. By God they deserve it. The money could be taken from the overseas aid budget and given to each and everyone of these HERO'S.
Come on Government DO THE RIGHT THING. DO YOU CARE.
attributes.background:
Give a TAX FREE lump sum to all Fantastic Health workers. This would be  a great way to say THANK YOU! to them all.
The money could come from the overseas aid budget

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
